section1.launchpad_for_projects: Launchpad for Projects of Future, on Astar Network.
section1.discover_limitless:
Discover the limitless possibilities of NFTs with our launchpad.

Experiment and explore the world of NFTs

dapp_staking.gain_more: Gain More Access by Staking your ASTR
dapp_staking.be_part_community: Be part of the community by staking your ASTR with Paras. Gain access to exclusive rewards, community perks, and other exciting opportunities

whats_good.user_friendly: A User-friendly, Seamless, and Secure Experience
whats_good.desc_verified: We’re committed towards building a higher level of assurance and credibility at Paras Launchpad. Through consistent evaluations to ensure the legitimacy and quality of all projects, creators and collectors are able to safely instill their confidence in verified launches.
whats_good.desc_multichain: Our platform arms users with greater flexibility and access to a wider range of NFTs across different blockchain networks, with the aim of expanding the reach of potential audiences and promoting interoperability, which benefits both creators and collectors.
whats_good.desc_gobeyond: Continuing to push beyond existing boundaries drives our commitment towards providing innovative services and features towards creators. Unlock the future as you explore the endless possibilities of NFTs, ranging from Art, Comic, Toys, Phygital and more.
whats_good.desc_cocreation: Paras puts the needs and interests of our users first. Whetheryou're a creator looking to showcase your work or a collector searching for unique and exciting NFTs, we invite you to join our community and help us shape the future of NFTs together.

about.premier_launchpad: The premier launchpad to expand the endgame of NFTs
about.desc_premier_launchpad: We are arming the creators of the future. We believe the future of innovation will be built on a foundation of a more open and decentralized world. Everyone will have the same opportunity to change the world, and it starts with Paras.

hero.bridging:
Bridging Web2 and Web3
 with Refundable NFT
hero.paras_designed:
Paras Launchpad is designed for mass adoption, and we’re
 proud to offer a unique refundable feature that sets us apart
 from the rest. 90 days. Up to 95%

explanation.rest_assured: Rest assured that your NFT purchase is protected with refundable functionality and coded directly into the smart contract.
explanation.flexibility: You'll have the flexibility to learn and explore this exciting space without any risk, making it easier than ever to get started.

hero_middle.we_believe:
We believe that Refundable NFTs
are the perfect way to onboard
new users into Web3
hero_middle.whether_youre:
Whether you're an experienced NFT collector or just getting
 started, our Refundable NFTs are the perfect way to join the
community and experience all that Web3 has to offer.

faq.desc_whats_refund: Refundable NFT is NFT that can be refunded with terms and conditions
faq.when_refund: When can I refund my NFT?
faq.desc_when_refund: NFT is refundable after the minting period is over
faq.whats_nft: What NFT that I can refund?
faq.desc_whats_nft: You can refund the NFT that you mint from our launchpad.
faq.howlong_refund: How long does it take to refund my NFT?
faq.desc_howlong_refund: You can refund your NFT after the post mint until 90 days after the collection launched
faq.howmany_nft: How many NFT that can I refund?
faq.desc_howmany_nft: You can refund as many NFT that you mint from our launchpad.
faq.whats_happen: What happens to the refunded NFT?
faq.desc_whats_happen: Once it’s refunded the NFT will be transferred to the refund address. The refund address will be set by the project’s creator.

MyNft.nft_being_indexed: NFT is still being indexed, please refresh the page in a few minutes

about.powerful_launchpad: Powerful Launchpad to expand the endgame of NFTs Projects
about.paras_is: Paras is an NFT launchpad & marketplace for digital collectibles. We focus on supporting and developing the crypto-native IPs

NotifyModal.we_send_you: We will send you an email for new collection launches
